thread.section_title: The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful Building, Great Location
thread.title_full: Beautiful Building, Great Location - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nyr38
title: Beautiful Building, Great Location
text: The newly refurbished Beekman Hotel gets very high marks for its beautiful atrium and trendy bar. While the rooms are fashionably appointed, they're small even by New York standards. It's location provides easy access to both FiDi and Brooklyn. Rooms on the north side of the building enjoy views of City Hall, the Woolworth Building and St. Paul's.
